Partnerships Between VR Agencies and IDD Agencies

Vocational Rehabilitation agencies frequently partner with other government agencies. This visualization illustrates the prominent areas of collaboration between VR and Intellectual and Developmental Disabilities (IDD) agencies. This visualization uses the data from the 2011 National Survey of State Vocational Rehabilitation Agencies.

Areas of Collaboration between VR and IDD Agencies, as Reported by VR Agencies.

Note: We do not have data from state IDD agencies to use as a comparison.

Powered by Socrata

Source: The 2011 National Survey of State Vocational Rehabilitation Agencies
